ygData.subject: various weapons and Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: a bloodclaw stiletto? sounds cool.. but also sounds like a piercing weapon ;( i know there must be some other SK only weapons about, since i now know of THREE
ygData.messageBody:
a bloodclaw stiletto? sounds cool.. but also sounds like a piercing weapon
;( i know there must be some other SK only weapons about, since i now know
of THREE paladin holy weapons. any info on SK holy weapons other than
darkreavers (or if you find out how to get a darkreaver) let us know!

grenix mucktail is a rare spawning gnoll, and he bears the rediculously
powerful polished granite tomahawk. as i have sworn never to reveal its
location, i can only tell you that you should look for where the mucktail
gnolls are :) (there are only 3 clans of gnolls in the entire game world, it
wont take you THAT long hehe)

as far as guk.. a lvl 6 can fight the tads that spawn near the door, but
this is risky business since people tend to block off the exit with their
large ogreish and trollish bodies. my reccomendation is to leave it alone
until at least lvl 10 or 12 or so, so you can survive long enough to flee
when you see a train coming up the ramp.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
